scripts.build+start:api: npm run build:api && npm run start:api
scripts.build+deploy:api: npm run build:api && npm run deploy:api
scripts.deploy-dev:api: cd src/api && sam deploy --no-confirm-changeset --no-fail-on-empty-changeset --parameter-overrides $(cat dev-parameters.env) --config-env dev
scripts.deploy:api: cd src/api && sam deploy --no-confirm-changeset --no-fail-on-empty-changeset --parameter-overrides $(cat parameters.env) --config-env prod
scripts.start:api: cd src/api && sam local start-api --parameter-overrides $(cat dev-parameters.env)
scripts.test:api: cd src/api && sam local invoke PreviewFunction --parameter-overrides $(cat parameters.env)
